summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a Sergeant, attaching a trial subpoena for a case in SDNY. The email discusses preparation for testimony via video conference in November 2021 and arrangements for travel and hotel for the trial.

persons.name: Sergeant
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the recipient of a trial subpoena for a case in SDNY, with plans to prep for testimony in November 2021.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, sending a trial subpoena and coordinating testimony preparation and travel arrangements for a witness in an SDNY case.

connections.description: Prosecutor issuing a trial subpoena to a witness and coordinating testimony preparation.

events.title: Trial Subpoena Issued
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a trial subpoena via email to a Sergeant for a case in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Planned Testimony Preparation
events.description: Planned video conference preparation for the Sergeant's testimony in the SDNY trial, scheduled for early November 2021.

keyFacts: A trial subpoena was issued on July 13, 2021, to a Sergeant for a case in the Southern District of New York.
The Assistant United States Attorney plans to conduct testimony preparation via video conference in early November 2021.
The prosecution intends to arrange travel and hotel accommodations for the witness for the trial.
